title: Litecoin and Polkadot holders exploring the Pomerdoge presale

title: Valkyrie moves to convert BTF into dual Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF
description: Valkyrie, according to recent announcements, has moved to converting $BTF into Bitcoin + Ether ETF ahead of competitors as SEC approval is awaited for Oct 3rd launch.

title: US Court Dismisses Class Action Lawsuit Against Bitfinex and Tether
description:
The Southern District of New York (SDNY) court has dismissed a lawsuit aimed at stablecoin issuer Tether and its affiliated company Bitfinex. The lawsuit, filed by Matthew Anderson and Shawn Dolifka, was centered around allegations that Tether’s stablecoin USDT was not backed one-to-one with US dollars, contrary to the firm’s assertions. According to Tether, Chief […]
